# strudel REPL

The editor is live at [strudel.cc](https://strudel.cc/?dXgsO_KpGcvB) or alternatively [strudel.tidalcycles.org](https://strudel.cc/?dXgsO_KpGcvB)

{/* <iframe className="w-full h-[600px]" src="https://strudel.tidalcycles.org/#%%%%3D" /> */}

![repl](./img/repl.png)

- Visual Feedback
- Tutorial + reference
- Shareable links
- Sound Browser
- Offline Support (+ installable PWA)
- Outputs: Web Audio, MIDI, OSC, CSound, Serial, ..
- customizable themes & fonts
